text: Jorge Fernando Quiroga Ram√≠rez (born May 5, 1960) nicknamed Tuto Quiroga is a Bolivian politician. He was President of Bolivia from August 7, 2001 to August 6, 2002. Quiroga was a candidate in the 2014 presidential election for the Christian Democratic Party. He was appointed as vice president of the Club de Madrid in 2011. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Bolivia Category:Vice presidents of Bolivia
title: Jorge Quiroga
